channel.title: Port Forwarding With Linksys
channel.description:
I've read the Ultimate Server Guide and the Port Forwarding Guide, but what they show is nothing like it is when I log into my Linksys Router. I go to "Application & Gaming" But when I go there it is...
Application: Start: End: Protocol: IP Adress:
It doesnt give me a place to put the port number, and my server name in it. What should I do?

item.title: Port Forwarding With Linksys
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

You put the name of your server in Application. Actually, it doesn’t matter what you put in it, as long as you remember what it is. Put your port number in the Start and End boxes. Change Protocol to TCP.

Read full topic
